text:
One, two, three, four.
One, two, three, four.

Oh, that was close! We were so close, Mano!
Let's try it again.

One, two, three, four.
One, two, three, four.

...Hey, hey, let's take a break, shall we?
I'm a little tired!

... That's enough for today.
It's not a good idea to push yourself too hard.

...I think it's probably better for Sakuragi-san
to do some self-training for now.

....Well then, as far as I'm concerned,
let's just call it homework until next time!

I'm sorry...
I kept making mistakes...

It's not just you Mano,
I'm not doing so well either...!

......I'm really, really sorry.
I'll fix what I did wrong before the next lesson.
